definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: act unfaithfully, treacherously, a priestly word (P Ez. Ch.), chiefly late (NH id., act unfaithfully; Ar. magala whisper, backbite, maga0lah;un perfidy, fraud);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[מָעַל]] Jos 22:20 + 4 t.; 3 fs. [[מָֽעֲלָה]] Le 5:21, Nu 5:12 + 13 t. Pf.; Impf. [[יִמְעַל]] Pr 16:10, 2Ch 26:16; 3 fs [[תִּמְעׂל]] Le 5:15, Nu 5:27; 3 mpl. [[יִמְעֲלוּ]] Jos 7:1, [[וַיִּמְעֲלוּ]] 1Ch 5:25; 2 mpl. [[תִּמְעָָלוּ]] Ne 1:8; Inf. cstr. [[לִמְעׂל]], so rd. for HCT [[למסר]] Nu 31:16 Thes Di;—act unfaithfully, treacherously, usu.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: abs. [[בַּחֵרֶם]] in the matter of the devoted thing (the sin of Achan) Jos 7:1 (JE), Jos 22:20 (P), cf. Le 5:15 (P), 2Ch 36:14, Ez Eze 14:13, Eze 15:8, Eze 18:24.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: wife against ([[בְּ]]) husband Nu 5:12, Nu 5:27 (P; marital infidelity).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[במשׁפט לא ימעל פיו]] Pr 16:10 let not his (the king's) mouth act treacherously against justice (RV in judgment).
